item.title: Magic Spells
item.dc:creator: @LittleMaffia LittleMaffia
item.description:
@LittleMaffia wrote:

if(playerHasItemAmount(###, #)) { //spell stuff deleteItem(####, getItemSlot(####), #); } else if(!playerHasItemAmount(###, #)) { sendMessage("You don't have enough runes to cast this spell."); }

Where do I need to put that?

Im asking for how to fix magic spells

If you cant help please dont spam me thread thanks.

Edit watch this ;

[quote=“i_own_pking”][quote author=ownage plz link=topic=179104.msg1638272#msg1638272 date=1185834924]
Should probably make a void for it seeing as you’re trying to duplicate calculate range / calculatemaxhit.
[/quote]

lol :S
[br][size=1]Posted on: July 30, 2007, 11:39:47 AM[/size][hr]:D[br][size=1]Posted on: July 30, 2007, 11:45:47 AM[/size][hr]Anyone help me please?[/quote]
